title.text: RFC 4937: IANA Considerations for PPP over Ethernet (PPPoE)

contents.text:
Network Working Group                                          P. Arberg
Request for Comments: 4937                              Redback Networks
Category: Informational                                     V. Mammoliti
                                                           Cisco Systems
                                                               June 2007
IANA Considerations for PPP over Ethernet (PPPoE)
contents.zh-CHS: 以太网PPP（PPPoE）的IANA注意事项

contents.text: Status of This Memo
contents.zh-CHS: 关于下段备忘

contents.text: This memo provides information for the Internet community. It does not specify an Internet standard of any kind. Distribution of this memo is unlimited.
contents.zh-CHS: 本备忘录为互联网社区提供信息。它没有规定任何类型的互联网标准。本备忘录的分发不受限制。

contents.text: Copyright Notice
contents.zh-CHS: 版权公告

contents.text: Copyright (C) The IETF Trust (2007).
contents.zh-CHS: 版权所有（C）IETF信托基金（2007年）。

contents.text: Abstract
contents.zh-CHS: 摘要

contents.text: This document describes the IANA considerations for the PPP over Ethernet (PPPoE) protocol.
contents.zh-CHS: 本文档描述了以太网PPP（PPPoE）协议的IANA注意事项。

contents.text: Table of Contents
contents.zh-CHS: 目录

contents.text: 1. Introduction
contents.zh-CHS: 1. 介绍

contents.text: This document provides guidance to the Internet Assigned Numbers Authority (IANA) regarding the registration of values related to the PPP over Ethernet Protocol (PPPoE), defined in [RFC2516], in accordance with BCP 26, [RFC2434]. It also reserves PPPoE TAG values as well as PPPoE packet Code fields, which are or have been in use on the Internet.
contents.zh-CHS: 本文件根据BCP 26、[RFC2434]，就[RFC2516]中定义的以太网PPP协议（PPPoE）相关值的注册向互联网分配号码管理局（IANA）提供指导。它还保留PPPoE标签值以及PPPoE数据包代码字段，这些字段现在或已经在互联网上使用。

contents.text: 1.1. Terminology
The following terms are used here with the meanings defined in BCP 26: "name space", "registration".
contents.zh-CHS: 以下术语的含义见BCP 26：“名称空间”、“注册”。

contents.text: The following policies are used here with the meanings defined in BCP 26: "First Come First Served".
contents.zh-CHS: 此处使用以下政策，其含义见BCP 26：“先到先得”。

contents.text: 1.2. Specification of Requirements
contents.zh-CHS: 1.2. 需求说明

contents.text: In this document, several words are used to signify the requirements of the specification. These words are often capitalized. The key words "MUST", "MUST NOT", "REQUIRED", "SHALL", "SHALL NOT", "SHOULD", "SHOULD NOT", "RECOMMENDED", "MAY", and "OPTIONAL" in this document are to be interpreted as described in [RFC2119].
contents.zh-CHS: 在本文件中，使用了几个词来表示规范的要求。这些词通常大写。本文件中的关键词“必须”、“不得”、“必需”、“应”、“不应”、“应”、“不应”、“建议”、“可”和“可选”应按照[RFC2119]中所述进行解释。

contents.text: 2. IANA Considerations
contents.zh-CHS: 2. IANA考虑

contents.text: The PPPoE protocol, as defined in [RFC2516], defines two name spaces that require registration, the PPPoE TAG and the PPPoE Code field.
contents.zh-CHS: [RFC2516]中定义的PPPoE协议定义了两个需要注册的名称空间，即PPPoE标签和PPPoE代码字段。

contents.text: 2.1. Registration Policies for PPPoE TAG Values
contents.zh-CHS: 2.1. PPPoE标签值的注册策略

contents.text: IANA has set up a registry of "PPPoE TAG Values". These are 16-bit values. PPPoE TAG values already in use are specified as reserved in this document. All other TAG values between 0 and 65535 are to be assigned by IANA, using the "First Come First Served" policy defined in [RFC2434].
contents.zh-CHS: IANA已经建立了一个“PPPoE标签值”注册表。这些是16位值。已使用的PPPoE标签值在本文档中指定为保留值。IANA将使用[RFC2434]中定义的“先到先得”策略分配0到65535之间的所有其他标记值。

contents.text: A TAG-Name and a description for the usage, as well as a point of contact, MUST be provided for any assignment from this registry. A document reference SHOULD also be provided.
contents.zh-CHS: 对于来自此注册表的任何分配，必须提供标记名和使用说明以及联系人。还应提供文件参考。

contents.text: 2.2. Reserved PPPoE TAG Values
contents.zh-CHS: 2.2. 保留的PPPoE标签值

contents.text:
TAG Value     TAG Name              Tag Description         Reference
-----------   -------------------   ---------------------   ---------
0    0x0000   End-Of-List           See the reference       [RFC2516]

257  0x0101   Service-Name          See the reference       [RFC2516]
258  0x0102   AC-Name               See the reference       [RFC2516]
259  0x0103   Host-Uniq             See the reference       [RFC2516]
260  0x0104   AC-Cookie             See the reference       [RFC2516]
261  0x0105   Vendor-Specific       See the reference       [RFC2516]
262  0x0106   Credits               See the reference       [RFC4938]
263  0x0107   Metrics               See the reference       [RFC4938]
264  0x0108   Sequence Number       See the reference       [RFC4938]

272  0x0110   Relay-Session-Id      See the reference       [RFC2516]
273  0x0111   HURL                  See the reference       [CARREL]
274  0x0112   MOTM                  See the reference       [CARREL]
288 0x0120 PPP-Max-Payload See the reference [RFC4638] 289 0x0121 IP_Route_Add See the reference [CARREL]
contents.zh-CHS: 288 0x0120 PPP最大有效载荷参见参考[RFC4638]289 0x0121 IP_路由_添加参见参考[CARREL]

contents.text:
513  0x0201   Service-Name-Error    See the reference       [RFC2516]
514  0x0202   AC-System-Error       See the reference       [RFC2516]
515  0x0203   Generic-Error         See the reference       [RFC2516]
2.3. Registration Policies for PPPoE Code Fields
contents.zh-CHS: 2.3. PPPoE代码字段的注册策略

contents.text: IANA has set up a registry of PPPoE Active Discovery Code fields. These are 8-bit values. PPPoE Code fields already in use are specified as reserved in this document. All other Code values between 0 and 255 are to be assigned by IANA, using the "First Come First Served" policy defined in [RFC2434].
contents.zh-CHS: IANA已建立PPPoE活动发现代码字段的注册表。这些是8位值。已在使用的PPPoE代码字段在本文档中指定为保留字段。IANA将使用[RFC2434]中定义的“先到先得”策略分配0到255之间的所有其他代码值。

contents.text: A PPPoE Active Discovery packet name and a description for the usage, as well as a point of contact, MUST be provided for any assignment from this registry.
contents.zh-CHS: 对于来自此注册表的任何分配，必须提供PPPoE主动发现数据包名称和使用说明以及联系点。

contents.text: A document reference SHOULD also be provided.
contents.zh-CHS: 还应提供文件参考。

contents.text: 2.4. Reserved PPPoE Code fields
contents.zh-CHS: 2.4. 保留的PPPoE代码字段

contents.text:
Code      PPPoE Packet Name              Description        Reference
--------  -----------------------------  -----------------  ---------
0   0x00  PPP Session Stage              See the reference  [RFC2516]
7 0x07 PADO, Offer See the reference [RFC2516] 9 0x09 PADI, Initiation See the reference [RFC2516]
contents.zh-CHS: 7 0x07 PADO，报价见参考[RFC2516]9 0x09 PADI，启动见参考[RFC2516]

contents.text:
10  0x0a  PADG, Session-Grant            See the reference  [RFC4938]
11  0x0b  PADC, Session-Credit Response  See the reference  [RFC4938]
12  0x0c  PADQ, Quality                  See the reference  [RFC4938]
25 0x19 PADR, Request See the reference [RFC2516] 101 0x65 PADS, Session-confirmation See the reference [RFC2516]
contents.zh-CHS: 25 0x19 PADR，请求参见参考[RFC2516]101 0x65 PADS，会话确认参见参考[RFC2516]

contents.text: 167 0xa7 PADT, Terminate See the reference [RFC2516]
contents.zh-CHS: 167 0xa7焊盘，终止，参见参考[RFC2516]

contents.text: 211 0xd3 PADM, Message See the reference [CARREL] 212 0xd4 PADN, Network See the reference [CARREL]
contents.zh-CHS: 211 0xd3 PADM，消息见参考[CARREL]212 0xd4 PADN，网络见参考[CARREL]

contents.text: 3. Security Considerations
contents.zh-CHS: 3. 安全考虑

contents.text: This document focuses on IANA considerations for the PPPoE protocol, and as such, should help remove the possibility of the same PPPoE code field and PPPoE TAG value being used for different functionalities.
contents.zh-CHS: 本文件主要关注PPPoE协议的IANA注意事项，因此，应帮助消除相同PPPoE代码字段和PPPoE标签值用于不同功能的可能性。

contents.text: 4. References
contents.zh-CHS: 4. 工具书类

contents.text: 4.1. Normative References
contents.zh-CHS: 4.1. 规范性引用文件

contents.text: [RFC2119] Bradner, S., "Key words for use in RFCs to Indicate Requirement Levels", BCP 14, RFC 2119, March 1997.
contents.zh-CHS: [RFC2119]Bradner，S.，“RFC中用于表示需求水平的关键词”，BCP 14，RFC 2119，1997年3月。

contents.text: [RFC2434] Narten, T. and H. Alvestrand, "Guidelines for Writing an IANA Considerations Section in RFCs", BCP 26, RFC 2434, October 1998.
contents.zh-CHS: [RFC2434]Narten，T.和H.Alvestrand，“在RFCs中编写IANA注意事项部分的指南”，BCP 26，RFC 2434，1998年10月。

contents.text: [RFC2516] Mamakos, L., Lidl, K., Evarts, J., Carrel, D., Simone, D., and R. Wheeler, "A Method for Transmitting PPP Over Ethernet (PPPoE)", RFC 2516, February 1999.
contents.zh-CHS: [RFC2516]Mamakos，L.，Lidl，K.，Evarts，J.，Carrel，D.，Simone，D.，和R.Wheeler，“通过以太网传输PPP（PPPoE）的方法”，RFC 2516，1999年2月。

contents.text: 4.2. Informative References
contents.zh-CHS: 4.2. 资料性引用

contents.text: [CARREL] Carrel D., Simone D., Ho C. and T. Stoner, "Extensions to a Method for Transmitting PPP Over Ethernet (PPPoE)", Work in Progress.
contents.zh-CHS: [CARREL]CARREL D.，Simone D.，Ho C.和T.Stoner，“通过以太网传输PPP（PPPoE）方法的扩展”，正在进行中。

contents.text: [RFC4938] Berry, B. and H. Holgate, "PPP Over Ethernet (PPPoE) Extensions for Credit Flow and Link Metrics", RFC 4938, June 2007.
contents.zh-CHS: [RFC4938]Berry，B.和H.Holgate，“信用流和链路度量的以太网PPP（PPPoE）扩展”，RFC 4938，2007年6月。

contents.text: [RFC4638] Arberg, P., Kourkouzelis, D., Duckett, M., Anschutz, T., and J. Moisand, "Accommodating a Maximum Transit Unit/Maximum Receive Unit (MTU/MRU) Greater Than 1492 in the Point-to-Point Protocol over Ethernet (PPPoE)", RFC 4638, September 2006.
contents.zh-CHS: [RFC4638]Arberg，P.，Kourkouzelis，D.，Duckett，M.，Anschutz，T.，和J.Moissand，“在以太网点对点协议（PPPoE）中容纳大于1492的最大传输单元/最大接收单元（MTU/MRU）”，RFC 4638，2006年9月。
